_comment: Image variant definitions for bazzite-nix builds

variants.name: string - variant identifier (must be unique)
variants.build_script: string - optional build script in build_files/, defaults to 'build.sh'
variants.image_suffix: string - optional suffix for output image name
variants.disabled: boolean - optional, defaults to false. Set to true to skip this variant

variants.name: upstream
variants.description: Builds the bazzite image with kernel from testing-updates

variants.name: cachyos
variants.description: Builds the bazzite image with kernel from cachyos copr
